snippet: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr.’s stature is likely to rise with the departure of other foreign-policy heavyweights.
abstract: Vice President Joseph R Biden Jr’s influence on foreign policy during Pres Obama's second term is likely to rise with the departure of other foreign-policy heavyweights; his stature has climbed due to his role in policy debates and his talent for personal relationships.
lead_paragraph: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr.’s stature is likely to rise with the departure of other foreign-policy heavyweights.

headline.seo: Biden May Take On Expanded Role in Foreign Policy
headline.main: Biden May Take On Expanded Role in Foreign Policy in Second Term
headline.print_headline: Biden May Take On an Expanded Role on Foreign Policy
